page.title: 13Local News
page.content: We looked in the{ARGUS}local newspaper for events which had happened from June 24-30. One of the little girls in our first year had a new baby brother. He weighed 12lbs 3ozs and was called John. His mother was really excited. She said she wanted him to grow up to be a rugby player. 50 children from St. Joseph's High School learnt about life saving techniques at the new Newport Leisure Centre. The Ebbw Bridge Baptist church closed on Sunday as their tin hut,which used to be football changing rooms,is being replaced by a new one. Children at Duffryn High School were sent home as their teachers were on a one day strike. There was a bed race at Tredegar House on Sunday.
